## Dip your toes in your browser

- Short RStudio lessons:  
    - [R programming basics](https://tutorials.shinyapps.io/04-Programming-Basics/)    
    - [Working with data](https://rstudio.cloud/learn/primers/2)    
        - [Filtering data](https://learnr-examples.shinyapps.io/ex-data-filter/#section-welcome)    
        - [Summarizing data](https://learnr-examples.shinyapps.io/ex-data-summarise/#section-welcome)
    - Visualizing data  
        - [Bar charts](https://rstudio.cloud/learn/primers/3.2)  
- Longer data wrangling lesson:  
    - [Datacamp](https://campus.datacamp.com/courses/introduction-to-the-tidyverse/data-wrangling-1) (First section is `FREE`)
